attributes.review: It’s funny how trump says me can people and black people are rapist and are in gangs. Though all the high school shootings are white people. We should all be equal . Living in 2020 with trump our president is not okay . Some people want to live without fearing something bad will happen because the color of their skin.
attributes.title: Anti- Trump

attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting a bootleg of Charlie and the Chocolate factory. That’s what the big orange guy was right?? An oompaloompa! I couldn’t have been more wrong. Instead, what I got was a giant Cheeto who can’t speak properly spewing racist, homophobic, and bigoted rhetoric. It just made me sad. Whatever you do, don’t download this app.
attributes.title: Worst App Ever

attributes.review: almost two days after downloading this app i received a letter in the mail from t. administration. it read “i can’t believe you can even work a phone with your sausage fingers you fat whale. we can see through the camera and i have never seen someone with so many chins and fat rolls. kindly delete this app so the people supporting us are actually mediocre humans. xx t <3” i was in absolute disgust as though i’ve struggled with my weight and eating disorders my entire life. #settleforbiden2020
attributes.title: horrible

attributes.review: I got this app to see what Trump was doing and where i can sign up for rallies. It took eight days to download and the app didn’t even work it just showed an orange. I literally threw my phone when i saw it because it was absolutely disgusting to look at. Horrid app. Don’t get.
attributes.title: Worst App Experience

attributes.review: This app made my phone glitch and made me lose some of my apps and even some of my photos. I also seen that somehow all these random numbers started popping up in my contact list. The moment I deleted the app, everything went back to normal. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It’s a big SCAM.
attributes.title: ⚠️⚠️ DON’T DOWNLOAD!!! ⚠️⚠️

attributes.review:
I hated this app. I went on, and it barley worked. Then whenever I was on my phone, but not on the app my phone would glitch. I deleted the app, and my phone stopped glitching. Once I downloaded it again my phone went back to glitching!! NOT GOOD FOR YOUR PHONE 🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️

xoxo  big boody judy
attributes.title: Not Good For Your Phone

attributes.review: i am only here to say that TIKTOK WILL NEVER BE BANNED😡😤willywonka tiktok is on there and i CANT lose my 💍sugardaddy🥵. i’m so disappointed in these decisions. anyways my dog just farted in my face because she saw how disgusting this app is, so i had to spray my dollar store brand coconuts and cream perfume. honestly that fragrance cannot get rid of the stink from this app AND MY FREAKING DOG.
attributes.title: 🥵🥰SAVE WILLYWONKA ❤️😘

attributes.review: Downloaded this app with so much excitement to participate in our election. I am APPALLED at what I received! All I got was a greasy Cheeto defending pedophiles and trying to take away our rights. This app is a sham and a disappointment. What a shame!! America would be greater without this racist infected toe pretending to be an adult. You did this to yourself hunni ✨🧚🏽‍♀️💫
attributes.title: Worlds worst app

attributes.review: This app was terrible. The speed was so slow and there were way to many add it’s so sad that this app was this way. The only thing slower is a the president but then again it is his app. I hope we get both of these things fixed soon.
attributes.title: No🖤

attributes.review: i got this app to look at all the information for the 2020 election. as soon as i downloaded it i got a virus alert. so i deleted it but then all my accounts got hacked and i had to. and new accounts on everything. if i could give it 0 stars i would. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: awful
